fr.sii.ogham.core.resource

Class LookupResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.resource.LookupResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NamedResource, Resource

    public class LookupResource
extends Object
implements NamedResource

    Resource that is able to handle string path prefixed by a lookup string. The lookup is case sensitive and must end with a ':'. It must not contain another ':' character.

    For example, a path could be "classpath:/email/hello.pdf". The lookup is "classpath:".

    The lookup can also be empty. The template path could then be "/email/hello.pdf".

    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Constructor Detail

      • LookupResource

        public LookupResource(ResourcePath path,
                      String name)
        Initialize the resource with the provided path to the resource content. The path may contain a lookup. The name is used for naming the resource.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the resource (may contain a lookup)
        name - the name to display for the resource

      • LookupResource

        public LookupResource(ResourcePath path)
        Initialize the resource with the provided path to the resource content. The path may contain a lookup. The name of the resource is automatically extracted from the provided path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the resource (may contain a lookup)

        public InputStream getInputStream()
                           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Resource
        Stream that contains the template content. The input stream MUST be readable several times so every time this method is called, a new InputStream is created. You MUST close the input stream after using it.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        an input stream that points to the template content
